word_mean: 簇虫：簇虫亚纲或簇虫属的原虫

PerfectNetExp.abs: 簇虫(Gregarine)是蚊虫体内常见的寄生性原生动物,在分类上属于原生物界(Protista)、顶复合器门(Apicomplexa)、簇虫纲(Gregarinea)、真簇虫目(Eugregarinida)、衣.

list.abs: 3. cephaline gregarine 有头簇虫(动) 4. gregarine movement 簇孢虫运动 5. monocystid gregarine 单房簇虫(动) 6. gregarine n. 簇虫.
gregarine的意思、解释 n.  1. 簇虫gregarine的用法例句 1. polycystid gregarine 多房簇虫(动) 2. dicystid gregarine 双房簇虫(动) 3. cephaline gregarine.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin Gregarina, from Latin gregarius (see gregarious)

means.word_mean: 1. vermiform protozoans parasitic in insects and other invertebrates
